attributes.action: Stop the Premier League and EFL from introducing B teams into the main EFL
attributes.background: With the abomination that is the checkatrade trophy already giving us B teams in EFL competitions it can only be a matter of time before these B teams make there way into the EFL. This is damaging to the lower league clubs and once again shows the FA have no interest in the lower divisions.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the Premier League and English Football League.
